𓇅 𓌉 𓌌 𓌈 ⋍ وَتِد watid “stake, peg, rod” ⇔ bat

𓌉 ʷḥḏ 𓌊 white < WTh/white/wash < B-R-T bright pyrit B-L-T > B-T B.D B.S B-L L-B > V-T L-V
𓌉 ˢḥḏ 𓌊 śveta < श्वेत sapêd 𓋴𓈙𓊪𓇶 (white) ⇔ 𓋴𓐟𓄿𓀁 sophia (wit)
𓌉 ⋍ 𓌌 ⋍ 𓋴𓌈𓆓𓇳
𓌉 ⋍ 𓌈 white, bright 𓋴𓌈𓆓𓇳
𓌉 𓏏 𓋑 | the White Crown|
𓌉 𓏏 𓋳 | white linen|

𓋴 𓌉 𓆓 𓇶 | white | 𒅆𒈪𒌓 ši-mi-ut S-P-T sapêd (ambi)

𔔻 𓍛 𓍙 𓌉 #malleus mace
𔔻 /wa/ վարզ varz vasara ⇔ Weiss булава́ bulavá baton "mace"
𓌉 𓏤 | mace| µbace / βmace sic or 𓌉⋍𓍛 phonetically? sophia⋍whit ⇔ whip?

𓌉 𓌃 𓎗 𓎘 𓇅 𓇇

HD: '𓌉' white rute 𓌃 mWRT , 𓎗 #WD 𓎘 (scr)wt/writ #WAD 𓇅 *WḪD wReed vs 𓇇 *FLḪD flax flecht ⇔ thatch dach thallasea

T4 WTh:watch/washed=>ash-𓌉-white⇨𓌌 Weiß 𓋠silver <!> U36 𓍛 harm.mACE T3 𓌈 T4 𓌉 ⇔ V24 𓎗 #wD(sc)writ 𓎗

𓌉 WaryT white wood < 𓌃 Bat/word < B-R-D bright 𓃀𓈎𓆭
𓇎 boreal 𓃀𓈎𓆭 bright ⇔ birch bagum Baum ⇔ white wood
